lead_paragraph: Former world number one Luke Donald considered quitting professional golf last May after a slump in form and a crisis of confidence dropped him out of the world's top 50 for the first time in more than a decade.

headline.print_headline: Donald Considered Quitting Golf After Confidence Crisis
headline.main: Donald Considered Quitting Golf After Confidence Crisis

snippet: Former world number one Luke Donald considered quitting professional golf last May after a slump in form and a crisis of confidence dropped him out of the world's top 50 for the first time in more than a decade....
